Fengdu county in Fuling suburbs of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan

sentences.english: After the romance of the Ming and Qing novel, the ghost town appears more mystery to people.
sentences.chinese: 經明清小說的渲染，豐都鬼城更加神祕怪誕。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter is the analysis of the integration of Fengdu scenic spot resources.
sentences.chinese: 豐都名山風景名勝區資源整合的對策分析。

sentences.english: Captain Tong is heading toward the city of ghosts, a temple overlooking the port of Feng Du.
sentences.chinese: 佟船長要前往鬼城，這是豐都上方的一座廟宇。

sentences.english: Send him again to plentiful all ghost metropolis?
The Ghost City, Fengdu, is the comprehensive expression of the ghost culture.
sentences.chinese: “鬼城”豐都更是鬼文化的集大成者。

sentences.english: As the sun set we docked at Fengdu.
sentences.chinese: 太陽落山時，我們的船在豐都靠岸。

sentences.english: In some words, the ghost culture inFengdu is declining.
sentences.chinese: 總之，豐都鬼神文化正在衰落。

sentences.english: By 2004, the former port has truly become a city of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 2004年時，豐都已成爲名副其實的鬼城。

sentences.english: The third chapter is the reasons about the integration of Fengdu Mountain scenic spot resources.
sentences.chinese: 豐都名山風景名勝區資源整合的原因。

sentences.english: David Li was born on the Yangtze close to Fang Du.
sentences.chinese: 李大衛在豐都附近的長江上出生。
